duties_responsibilities.duty: Deliver a positive customer experience through consultative skills, order management, and providing product information.
Operate and maintain a variety of equipment, manage production queue, and complete assigned tasks based on priority.
Follow instructions, assist in training, and demonstrate consultative behaviors to understand each customer's individualized needs.
Ensure customer problems are resolved quickly and to the satisfaction of the customer, and takes complex customer orders using order systems.

Maintain a safe, clean, and orderly retail store, handle financial transactions using a Point of Sale terminal (POS), and clean, repair, and stock all retail store printing and shipping equipment and supplies.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or equivalent education
